Bow.name: Polar Star
Bow.passive_description: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by {}%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by {}%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

Bow.name: Thundering Pulse
Bow.passive_description: Increases ATK by {}% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by {}%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Bow.name: Amos' Bow
Bow.passive_description: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by {}%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further {}% every 0.1 seconds the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

Bow.name: Elegy for the End
Bow.passive_description: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by {}. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by {} and increases ATK by {}%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Bow.name: Skyward Harp
Bow.passive_description: Increases CRIT DMG by {}%. Hits have a {}% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: Compound Bow
Bow.passive_description: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by {}% and Normal ATK SPD by {}% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Bow.name: The Viridescent Hunt
Bow.passive_description: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing {}% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: Prototype Crescent
Bow.passive_description: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by {}% for 10s.

Bow.name: Hamayumi
Bow.passive_description: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {}% and Charged Attack DMG by {}%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

Bow.name: Mitternachts Waltz
Bow.passive_description: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by {}% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by {}% for 5s.

Bow.name: Windblume Ode
Bow.passive_description: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by {}% for 6s.

Bow.name: Alley Hunter
Bow.passive_description: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by {}% every second up to a max of {}%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by {}% per second until it reaches 0%.

Bow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
Bow.passive_description: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Bow.name: Favonius Warbow
Bow.passive_description: CRIT hits have a {}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: Sacrificial Bow
Bow.passive_description: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {}% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: The Stringless
Bow.passive_description: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {}%.

Bow.name: Rust
Bow.passive_description: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {}% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Bow.name: Royal Bow
Bow.passive_description: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Catalyst.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
Catalyst.passive_description: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an {}% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

Catalyst.name: Skyward Atlas
Catalyst.passive_description: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by {}%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing {}% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

Catalyst.name: Memory of Dust
Catalyst.passive_description: Increases Shield Strength by {}%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {}% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Catalyst.name: Everlasting Moonglow
Catalyst.passive_description: Healing Bonus increased by {}%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by {}% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.
Catalyst.weapon_asc_mat: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

Catalyst.name: Mappa Mare
Catalyst.passive_description: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a {}% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

Catalyst.name: Blackcliff Agate
Catalyst.passive_description: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Catalyst.name: Royal Grimoire
Catalyst.passive_description: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Catalyst.name: Sacrificial Fragments
Catalyst.passive_description: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {}% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {}s.

Catalyst.name: Solar Pearl
Catalyst.passive_description: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {}% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by {}% for 6s.

Catalyst.name: The Widsith
Catalyst.passive_description:
When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s.
Recitative: ATK is increased by {}%.
Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by {}%.
Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by {}.

Catalyst.name: Hakushin Ring
Catalyst.passive_description: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a {}% Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.
Catalyst.weapon_asc_mat: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

Catalyst.name: Dodoco Tales
Catalyst.passive_description:
Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by {}% for 6s.

Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by {}% for 6s.

Catalyst.name: Favonius Codex
Catalyst.passive_description: CRIT hits have a {}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {}s.

Catalyst.name: Wine and Song
Catalyst.passive_description: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate sprint by {}% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by {}% for 5s.

Catalyst.name: Prototype Amber
Catalyst.passive_description: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates {} Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate {}% HP every 2s for this duration.

Catalyst.name: Frostbearer
Catalyst.passive_description: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {}% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing {}% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt {}% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

Catalyst.name: Eye of Perception
Catalyst.passive_description: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing {}% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every {}s.

Claymore.name: Wolf's Gravestone
Claymore.passive_description: Increases ATK by {}%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by {}% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Claymore.name: Skyward Pride
Claymore.passive_description: Increases all DMG by {}%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does {}% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Claymore.name: Song of Broken Pines
Claymore.passive_description:
A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by {}%, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s.

When you possess four Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by {}% and increases ATK by {}%.

Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement", buffs of the same type will not stack.

Claymore.name: The Unforged
Claymore.passive_description: Increases Shield Strength by {}%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {}% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Claymore.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
Claymore.passive_description: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {}%. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a {}% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that charges and deals 100% ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

Claymore.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
Claymore.passive_description: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {}%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

Claymore.name: Blackcliff Slasher
Claymore.passive_description: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Claymore.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
Claymore.passive_description: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {}% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing {}% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt {}% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

Claymore.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
Claymore.passive_description: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {}% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {}s.

Claymore.name: Lithic Blade
Claymore.passive_description: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains {}% ATK increase and {}% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Claymore.name: Serpent Spine
Claymore.passive_description: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal {}% more DMG and take {}% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

Claymore.name: Akuoumaru
Claymore.passive_description: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by {}%. A maximum of {}% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.
Claymore.weapon_asc_mat: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

Claymore.name: Whiteblind
Claymore.passive_description: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {}% for 6s. Max 4 stacks ({}% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.

Claymore.name: The Bell
Claymore.passive_description: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to {}% of max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains {}% increased DMG.

Claymore.name: Royal Greatsword
Claymore.passive_description: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Claymore.name: Rainslasher
Claymore.passive_description: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by {}%.

Claymore.name: Prototype Archaic
Claymore.passive_description: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional {}% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

Claymore.name: Favonius Greatsword
Claymore.passive_description: CRIT hits have a {}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {}s.

Polearm.name: Skyward Spine
Polearm.passive_description: Increases CRIT Rate by {}% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals {}% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Polearm.name: Engulfing Lightning
Polearm.passive_description: ATK increased by {}% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of {}% ATK. Gain {}% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

Polearm.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
Polearm.passive_description: On hit, increases ATK by {}% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by {}%.

Polearm.name: Staff of Homa
Polearm.passive_description: HP increased by {}%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {}% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK bonus is increased by an additional {}% of Max HP.

Polearm.name: Vortex Vanquisher
Polearm.passive_description: Increases Shield Strength by {}%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {}% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Polearm.name: Crescent Pike
Polearm.passive_description: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional {}% ATK as DMG for 5s.

Polearm.name: The Catch
Polearm.passive_description: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {}% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by {}%.

Polearm.name: Prototype Starglitter
Polearm.passive_description: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by {}% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Polearm.name: Kitain Cross Spear
Polearm.passive_description: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {}%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

Polearm.name: Dragonspine Spear
Polearm.passive_description: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {}% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing {}% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt {}% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

Polearm.name: Royal Spear
Polearm.passive_description: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Polearm.name: Favonius Lance
Polearm.passive_description: CRIT hits have a {}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {}s.

Polearm.name: Lithic Spear
Polearm.passive_description: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains {}% ATK increase and a {}% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Polearm.name: Deathmatch
Polearm.passive_description: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {}% and DEF is increased by {}%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {}%.

Polearm.name: Dragon's Bane
Polearm.passive_description: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by {}%.

Polearm.name: Blackcliff Pole
Polearm.passive_description: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Sword.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
Sword.passive_description: Gain a {}% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a {}% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.
Sword.weapon_asc_mat: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

Sword.name: Skyward Blade
Sword.passive_description: Crit Rate increased by {}%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to {}% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Sword.name: Freedom-Sworn
Sword.passive_description:
A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by {}%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field.
When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG by {}% and increases ATK by {}%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s.
Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Sword.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
Sword.passive_description: HP increased by {}%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {}% of the wielder's Max HP.

Sword.name: Summit Shaper
Sword.passive_description: Increases Shield Strength by {}%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {}% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Sword.name: Aquila Favonia
Sword.passive_description: ATK is increased by {}%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to {}% of ATK and dealing {}% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Sword.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
Sword.passive_description: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates {} Energy for each seed consumed.
Sword.weapon_asc_mat: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

Sword.name: Festering Desire
Sword.passive_description: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {}% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by {}%.

Sword.name: The Alley Flash
Sword.passive_description: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by {}%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Sword.name: Favonius Sword
Sword.passive_description: CRIT hits have a {}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {}s.

Sword.name: The Black Sword
Sword.passive_description:
Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by {}%.
Additionally, regenerates {}% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Sword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
Sword.passive_description: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Sword.name: The Flute
Sword.passive_description: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals {}% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Sword.name: Sacrificial Sword
Sword.passive_description: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {}% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {}s.

Sword.name: Royal Longsword
Sword.passive_description: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Sword.name: Prototype Rancour
Sword.passive_description: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {}% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Sword.name: Lion's Roar
Sword.passive_description: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by {}%.

Sword.name: Iron Sting
Sword.passive_description: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by {}% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
